file_content.text: You truly are a stubborn one. Won't be satisfied until you've completely inconvenienced me, will you?
Come out from the shadows and face justice.
Show yourself, Sith.
I killed your spy. Without her marking people, you'll run out of targets.
Aleyna is dead.
Then I'll have to make the most of who's left.
You're done, Sith. Duke Thul and I captured your spy--and the Death Mark was destroyed.
I captured Aleyna.
How disappointing. But I suppose all good times must end.
I won't be satisfied until I hear your dying breath.
Prepare to die.
You're much too passionate for a Jedi. Ever consider you're on the wrong side?
My master is transmitting the most amusing holomessage right now. You really should watch it with me....
Assaulting my cruiser alone. Very careless of you, Orgus Din.
It's not too late, Angral. Do the right thing, for once. Surrender.
Pity you didn't bring your student. I could kill you both.
Tell me, Jedi. Are you afraid to die?
There is no death. There is only the Force.
If there is no death... where is my son?
No!
Master Orgus!
And now I'll finish you. After all, you can't fight what you can't see.
My eyes are the Force--and you can't hide forever.
I see just fine.
The Force will guide me. You won't escape.
I don't fear the dark.
Let's be done with this. I have a long list of people to kill.
I don't need to see you. I can smell you.
Your stench betrays you.
I'm starting to like you. What a shame you have to die.
I have no tears for that old man. I'm stronger than him, you and Angral combined.
Orgus was weak, like you.
Strength is overrated. It's better to strike first than hardest.
Oh, I almost forgot. The Death Mark laser is finally back online... and it's tracking you.
